website_summaries.verdict: Not the roomiest tent, but it excels in ease of use. Ideal for deep woods campers who want to pitch a tent quickly and tear it down just as fast.
pros: Sleeps four in bags or two on a queen air mattress
Electrical outlet port and storage pockets
10 steel stakes and a carrying bag included
Two side vents provide good airflow
cons: Ceiling height is lower than some may prefer

website_summaries.verdict: A great tent that is easy to pitch at a good price.
pros: Side openings make it great for breezy sleeping
No assembly required, as poles attached to the tent
cons: Will not be great for hauling long distances
Has some leaking problems in heavy rains

customer_reviews.title: Very nice tent
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to put up. It’s perfect for two people to sleep. I also purchased a 12x14 tarp to put over the tent for rain and wind protection. The tarp is large enough so that I’ll have a place to store things and a sitting area.
customer_reviews.author: Ernie from Texas

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly good deal
customer_reviews.text: Incredibly cool tent-so easy to put up and take down,and folds right back up and goes into its carry bag easy,I love this tent=PERFECT for car camping,(to small for four people but plenty big enough for two).we've used it three times so far,and I can think of absolutely no complaint I have about it
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: it is so easy to set up and take down
customer_reviews.text: This is actually my second tent the first one I bought for my son add a place on Black Friday.. it is so easy to set up and take down... We keep one for winter camping in the living room 😂 I ordered another to use outside in the summer!
customer_reviews.author: Jimmypopalinskii

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble, hard to get out
customer_reviews.text: This tent is amazing. Goes up in about 30 seconds once you know what you’re doing. My only complaint is about the zipper flap covering the door. The zipper catches on the fabric and makes it nearly impossible to exit the tent from the inside. Other than that, awesome tent.
customer_reviews.author: Cool Jerk

customer_reviews.title: Worked well
customer_reviews.text: Workers great for a young scout. Minor problems with condensate.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby T.

customer_reviews.title: Fast setup
customer_reviews.text: Great tent, super super easy and fast to put up and take down. Love it
customer_reviews.author: Craig A. Rybarczyk

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy tent
customer_reviews.text: This tent is sturdy & very easy to put up! Won't use any other tent
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great INSTANT tent.
customer_reviews.text: My kids even put it inside for fun. They have two twin mattress/cot in there. (Got as agift) but it's perfect fits all of us and our dog.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Good tent
customer_reviews.text: This tent is great. Super easy to set up. There were a few holes in the tent when we opened it so I had to get a patch kit since the patch it comes with is for the floor and doesn't stick to the actual tent. Other than that issue it's a good tent for family camping.
customer_reviews.author: Jessi

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up alone
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up alone. Mine had the polls installed the wrong way so I had to take it apart and reassemble it. Doesn't hold up in rain or light showers.
customer_reviews.author: tasha hicks

product_meta.title: Ozark Trail 4-Person 8' x 7' Instant A-Frame Tent (Brown)
product_meta.description: The Ozark Trail 4-Person A-Frame Tent sets up in 30 seconds! This free-standing, four-person tent requires no assembly — the poles are pre-attached to the tent. Just unfold, extend, and you're ready to camp! It comfortably fits one queen air bed or up to four campers in sleeping bags on the floor. Enjoy the night comfortably with two oversized side vents for cross-breeze ventilation. Keep yourself organized and connected with the organizational pockets and electrical port access.
feature_bullets: Sleeps 4 / Easy 30-second setup / No assembly required: poles are pre-attached to tent / Free-standing frame design
Fits 1 queen air bed / 2 oversized side vents for air circulation / Includes electrical port access and organizational pockets /
Carry bag included / Tent stakes included
Measures: 8' x 7' / Center height: 52" / Construction: 190T coated polyester, steel and fiberglass
Assembled Product Dimensions (L x W x H) 96.00 x 84.00 x 52.00 Inches

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars20 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
